00001 /*
00002 ###############################################################################
00003 #
00004 #  EGSnrc egs++ dose scoring object
00005 #  Copyright (C) 2015 National Research Council Canada
00006 #
00007 #  This file is part of EGSnrc.
00008 #
00009 #  EGSnrc is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under
00010 #  the terms of the GNU Affero General Public License as published by the
00011 #  Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your
00012 #  option) any later version.
00013 #
00014 #  EGSnrc is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY
00015 #  WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS
00016 #  FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the GNU Affero General Public License for
00017 #  more details.
00018 #
00019 #  You should have received a copy of the GNU Affero General Public License
00020 #  along with EGSnrc. If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
00021 #
00022 ###############################################################################
00023 #
00024 #  Author:          Ernesto Mainegra-Hing, 2012
00025 #
00026 #  Contributors:    Frederic Tessier
00027 #
00028 ###############################################################################
00029 #
00030 #  A general dose calculation tool. Since it is outside the scope of the
00031 #  EGS_Application class, a few utility methods are needed in EGS_Application
00032 #  to retrieve information regarding media, geometry and source.
00033 #
00034 #  Dose is output for each dose region without any spacial information. For a
00035 #  more detailed dose scoring grid it is better to create a user code which
00036 #  could produce 3D dose distributions and graph data.
00037 #
00038 #  Can be used in any C++ user code by entering the proper input block in
00039 #  the ausgab object definition block.
00040 #
00041 #  Prints out dose in each dose scoring region.
00042 #
00043 #  Dose scoring regions can be defined by input using one the following
00044 #  syntax for individual regions:
00045 #
00046 #  :start ausgab object definition:
00047 #      :start ausgab object:
00048 #          library      = egs_dose_scoring
00049 #          name         = some_name
00050 #          volume       = V0  V1 ... Vn
00051 #          dose regions = IR0 IR1 ... IRn
00052 #      :stop ausgab object:
00053 #  :stop ausgab object definition:
00054 #
00055 #  or by groups of consecutive regions:
00056 #
00057 #  :start ausgab object definition:
00058 #      :start ausgab object:
00059 #          library           = egs_dose_scoring
00060 #          name              = some_name
00061 #          volume            = V0 V1 ... Vn
00062 #          dose start region = IRI_0 ... IRI_N
00063 #          dose stop region  = IRE_0 ... IRE_N
00064 #      :stop ausgab object:
00065 #  :stop ausgab object definition:
00066 #
00067 #  where one can have same number of volume entries as group of regions (n=N)
00068 #  or same number of volume entries as number of individual regions. If there
00069 #  are more dose scoring regions than volume entries, a default volume is use for
00070 #  those regions without volume information. This default can be either the first
00071 #  volume entry or 1 g/cm3.
00072 #
00073 #  TODO:
00074 #
00075 #  - Classify dose as contributed by primary or scattered particles
00076 #  - Custom classification using latch
00077 #  - Dose to medium calculation
00078 #
00079 ###############################################################################
00080 */
00081 
00082 
00088 #include <fstream>
00089 #include <string>

00091 #include "egs_dose_scoring.h"

00095 EGS_DoseScoring::EGS_DoseScoring(const string &Name,
00096                                  EGS_ObjectFactory *f) :
00097     EGS_AusgabObject(Name,f), nreg(0), m_lastCase(-1), nmedia(0),
00098     dose(0), doseM(0), max_dreg(-1), max_medl(0),
00099     score_medium_dose(false), score_region_dose(false), norm_u(1.0) {
00100     otype = "EGS_DoseScoring";
00101 }
00102 
00103 EGS_DoseScoring::~EGS_DoseScoring() {
00104     if (dose) {
00105         delete dose;
00106     }
00107     if (doseM) {
00108         delete doseM;
00109     }
00110 }

00112 void EGS_DoseScoring::setApplication(EGS_Application *App) {
00113     EGS_AusgabObject::setApplication(App);
00114     if (!app) {
00115         return;
00116     }
00117     // Get the number of regions in the geometry.
00118     nreg = app->getnRegions();
00119     // Get the number of media in the input file
00120     nmedia = app->getnMedia();
00121     // determine maximum medium name length
00122     char buf[32];
00123     int count = 0;
00124     int imed=0;
00125     for (imed=0; imed < nmedia; imed++) {
00126         sprintf(buf,"%s%n",app->getMediumName(imed),&count);
00127         if (count > max_medl) {
00128             max_medl = count;
00129         }
00130     }
00131     if (d_region.size()>nreg)
00132         egsWarning("\n*********************************************"
00133                    "\n WARNING:"
00134                    "\nRequesting %d dose scoring regions, but there"
00135                    "\nare only %d geometrical regions!"
00136                    "\nscoring will be done in all regions!"
00137                    "\n*********************************************",
00138                    d_region.size(),nreg);
00139     // Flag dose scoring regions in geometry
00140     // and set their volume.
00141     if (score_region_dose) {
00142         if (d_region.size() && d_region.size() < nreg) { // specific dose regions provided
00143             // Get maximum dose scoring region
00144             for (vector<int>::iterator it = d_region.begin(); it < d_region.end(); it++) {
00145                 if (*it > max_dreg) {
00146                     max_dreg = *it;
00147                 }
00148             }
00149             for (int j=0; j<nreg; j++) {
00150                 d_reg_index.push_back(-1);
00151                 vol.push_back(vol_list[0]);// set to either 1.0 or first volume entered
00152             }
00153             for (int i=0; i<d_region.size(); i++) {
00154                 d_reg_index[d_region[i]]=i;
00155                 if (i < vol_list.size()) {
00156                     vol[d_region[i]] = vol_list[i];
00157                 }
00158             }
00159             if (score_region_dose) {
00160                 dose = new EGS_ScoringArray(d_region.size());
00161             }
00162         }
00163         else { // scoring in all regions
00164             max_dreg = nreg-1;
00165             for (int j=0; j<nreg; j++) {
00166                 d_reg_index.push_back(j);
00167                 if (j < vol_list.size()) {
00168                     vol.push_back(vol_list[j]);
00169                 }
00170                 else { // more regions than volumes, use default 1 g/cm3 or first volume entered
00171                     vol.push_back(vol_list[0]);
00172                 }
00173             }
00174             if (score_region_dose) {
00175                 dose = new EGS_ScoringArray(nreg);
00176             }
00177         }
00178     }
00179     // If requested request memory for medium dose
00180     if (score_medium_dose) {
00181         doseM =  new EGS_ScoringArray(nmedia);
00182     }
00183     if (!score_region_dose) { // setup volumes
00184         if (vol_list.size() == 1) {
00185             vol.push_back(vol_list[0]);
00186         }
00187         else {
00188             for (int j=0; j<nreg; j++) {
00189                 if (j < vol_list.size()) {
00190                     vol.push_back(vol_list[j]);
00191                 }
00192                 else { // more regions than volumes, use default 1 g/cm3 or first volume entered
00193                     vol.push_back(vol_list[0]);
00194                 }
00195             }
00196         }
00197     }
00198 
00199     description = "\n*******************************************\n";
00200     description +=  "Dose Scoring Object (";
00201     description += name;
00202     description += ")\n";
00203     description += "*******************************************\n";
00204     if (dose) {
00205         description +="\n - Regions in dose calculator :";
00206         sprintf(buf,"%d\n\n",dose->regions());
00207         description += buf;
00208     }
00209     if (doseM) {
00210         description += " - Medium dose will be calculated\n";
00211     }
00212     description += "\n--------------------------------------\n";
00213     sprintf(buf,"%*s %*s rho/[g/cm**3]\n",max_medl/2,"medium",max_medl/2," ");
00214     description += buf;
00215     description += "--------------------------------------\n";
00216     for (imed=0; imed < nmedia; imed++) {
00217         sprintf(buf,"%-*s",max_medl,app->getMediumName(imed));
00218         description += buf;
00219         description += " ";
00220         sprintf(buf,"%5.2f",app->getMediumRho(imed));
00221         description += buf;
00222         description += "\n";
00223     }
00224     description += "--------------------------------------\n";
00225     if (norm_u != 1.0) {
00226         description += " Non-unity user-requested normalization = ";
00227         sprintf(buf,"%g\n",norm_u);
00228         description += buf;
00229     }
00230     description += "\n*******************************************\n\n";
00231     vol_list.clear();
00232     if (d_region.size()) {
00233         d_region.clear();
00234     }
00235 }
00236 
00237 void EGS_DoseScoring::reportResults() {
00238     egsInformation("\n======================================================\n");
00239     egsInformation("Dose Scoring Object(%s)\n",name.c_str());
00240     egsInformation("======================================================\n");
00241     EGS_Float normD = 1., normE=1.;
00242     int count = 0;
00243     EGS_Float F = app->getFluence();
00244     egsInformation("=> last case = %lld fluence = %g\n", m_lastCase, F);
00245     /* Normalize to actual source fluence */
00246     normE = m_lastCase/F*norm_u;
00247     normD = 1.602e-10*normE;
00248     int irmax_digits = getDigits(max_dreg);
00249     string line;
00250     double r,dr;
00251     if (dose) {
00252         if (normE==1) {
00253             egsInformation("\n\n==> Summary of region dosimetry (per particle)\n");
00254             egsInformation(
00255                 "%*s %*s %*s rho/[g/cm3]  V/cm3      Edep/[MeV]              D/[Gy]            %n\n",
00256                 irmax_digits,"ir",max_medl/2,"medium",max_medl/2," ",&count);
00257         }
00258         else {
00259             egsInformation("\n==> Summary of region dosimetry (per fluence)\n");
00260             egsInformation(
00261                 "%*s %*s %*s rho/[g/cm3]  V/cm3    Edep/[MeV*cm2]            D/[Gy*cm2]         %n\n",
00262                 irmax_digits,"ir",max_medl/2,"medium",max_medl/2," ",&count);
00263         }
00264         line.append(count,'-');
00265         egsInformation("%s\n",line.c_str());
00266 
00267         /* Compute deposited energy and dose */
00268         for (int ireg = 0; ireg < nreg; ireg++) {
00269             if (d_reg_index[ireg]>=0) {
00270                 if (!(app->isRealRegion(ireg))) {
00271                     continue;
00272                 }
00273                 int imed = app->getMedium(ireg);
00274                 EGS_Float rho = app->getMediumRho(imed);
00275                 EGS_Float mass = vol[ireg]*rho;
00276                 dose->currentResult(d_reg_index[ireg],r,dr);
00277                 if (r > 0) {
00278                     dr = dr/r;
00279                 }
00280                 else {
00281                     dr=1;
00282                 }
00283                 egsInformation("%*d %-*s %7.3f   %8.4f %10.4e +/- %-7.3f%% %10.4e +/- %-7.3f%%\n",
00284                                irmax_digits,ireg,max_medl,app->getMediumName(imed),rho,vol[ireg],r*normE,dr*100.,r*normD/mass,dr*100.);
00285             }
00286         }
00287         egsInformation("%s\n",line.c_str());
00288     }
00289     if (doseM) {
00290         vector<EGS_Float> massM(nmedia,0);
00291         int imed = 0;
00292         for (int ir=0; ir<nreg; ir++) {
00293             imed = app->getMedium(ir);
00294             EGS_Float volume = vol.size() > 1 ? vol[ir]:vol[0];
00295             massM[imed] += app->getMediumRho(imed)*volume;
00296         }
00297         if (normE==1) {
00298             egsInformation("\n\n==> Summary of media dosimetry (per particle)\n");
00299             egsInformation(
00300                 "%*s %*s     Edep/[MeV]              D/[Gy]            %n\n",
00301                 max_medl/2,"medium",max_medl/2," ",&count);
00302         }
00303         else {
00304             egsInformation("\n\n==> Summary of media dosimetry (per fluence)\n");
00305             egsInformation(
00306                 "%*s %*s     Edep/[MeV*cm2]              D/[Gy*cm2]            %n\n",
00307                 max_medl/2,"medium",max_medl/2," ",&count);
00308         }
00309         line="";
00310         line.append(count,'-');
00311         egsInformation("%s\n",line.c_str());
00312         /* Compute deposited energy in medium (MeV)*/
00313         for (int im=0; im<nmedia; im++) {
00314             doseM->currentResult(im,r,dr);
00315             if (r > 0) {
00316                 dr = dr/r;
00317                 egsInformation(
00318                     "%-*s %10.4e +/- %-7.3f%% %10.4e +/- %-7.3f%%\n",
00319                     max_medl,app->getMediumName(im),r*normE,dr*100.,r*normD/massM[im],dr*100.);
00320             }
00321         }
00322         egsInformation("%s\n",line.c_str());
00323     }
00324     egsInformation("\n======================================================\n");
00325 }

00327 bool EGS_DoseScoring::storeState(ostream &data) const {
00328     //egsInformation("Storing EGS_DoseScoring...\n");
00329     if (!egsStoreI64(data,m_lastCase)) {
00330         return false;
00331     }
00332     data << endl;
00333     if (dose  && !dose->storeState(data)) {
00334         return false;
00335     }
00336     if (doseM && !doseM->storeState(data)) {
00337         return false;
00338     }
00339     return true;
00340 }
00341 
00342 bool  EGS_DoseScoring::setState(istream &data) {
00343     if (!egsGetI64(data,m_lastCase)) {
00344         return false;
00345     }
00346     if (dose  && !dose->setState(data)) {
00347         return false;
00348     }
00349     if (doseM && !doseM->setState(data)) {
00350         return false;
00351     }
00352     return true;
00353 }
00354 
00355 bool  EGS_DoseScoring::addState(istream &data) {
00356     int err = addTheStates(data);
00357     if (err) {
00358         egsInformation("Error code: %d",err);
00359         return false;
00360     }
00361     return true;
00362 }
00363 int  EGS_DoseScoring::addTheStates(istream &data) {
00364     EGS_I64 tmp_case;
00365     if (!egsGetI64(data,tmp_case)) {
00366         return 4401;
00367     }
00368     m_lastCase += tmp_case;
00369     if (dose) {
00370         EGS_ScoringArray tmp(nreg);
00371         if (!tmp.setState(data)) {
00372             return 4402;
00373         }
00374         (*dose) += tmp;
00375     }
00376     if (doseM) {
00377         EGS_ScoringArray tmpM(nmedia);
00378         if (!tmpM.setState(data)) {
00379             return 4403;
00380         }
00381         (*doseM) += tmpM;
00382     }
00383     return 0;
00384 }
00385 
00386 void EGS_DoseScoring::resetCounter() {
00387     m_lastCase = 0;
00388     if (dose) {
00389         dose->reset();
00390     }
00391     if (doseM) {
00392         doseM->reset();
00393     }
00394 }
00395 
00396 //*********************************************************************
00397 // Process input for this ausgab object
00398 //
00399 // volume: Set to 1 cm3 by default
00400 //         One entry       => same size dose scoring regions
00401 //         Several entries => volume for each dose region
00402 //                            SAME as dose region number
00403 //                            or else default value used
00404 //
00405 // dose scoring regions: Defaults to all regions in geometry
00406 //         dose regions           => Individual regions
00407 //         dose start/stop region => Groups of consecutive
00408 //                                   dose regions
00409 //
00410 // If there is a mismatch between number of regions and volumes
00411 // default volume values will be used. Default volume will be either
00412 // the first volume entry or 1 g/cm3 if no volume entry found.
00413 //
00414 // TODO:
00415 // - Classify in primary, scattered and total dose
00416 // - Specify for wich media to score or not the dose
00417 //
00418 //**********************************************************************
00419 extern "C" {
00420 
00421     EGS_DOSE_SCORING_EXPORT EGS_AusgabObject *createAusgabObject(EGS_Input *input,
00422             EGS_ObjectFactory *f) {
00423         const static char *func = "createAusgabObject(dose_scoring)";
00424         if (!input) {
00425             egsWarning("%s: null input?\n",func);
00426             return 0;
00427         }
00428         vector <EGS_Float> v_in;// voxel volume[s] in g/cm3
00429         /* get voxel volume */
00430         input->getInput("volume",v_in);
00431         /* get dose scoring mode: region dose, medium dose or both */
00432         vector<string> allowed_mode;
00433         allowed_mode.push_back("no");
00434         allowed_mode.push_back("yes");
00435         int d_in_medium = input->getInput("medium dose",allowed_mode,0);
00436         int d_in_region = input->getInput("region dose",allowed_mode,1);
00437 
00438         /* get dose regions */
00439         vector <int> d_regions;
00440         bool using_all_regions=true;
00441         vector <int> d_start, d_stop;
00442         if (!input->getInput("dose regions",d_regions)&& d_regions.size()>0) {
00443             using_all_regions = false;    // individual regions
00444         }
00445         else {
00446             int err1 = input->getInput("dose start region",d_start);
00447             int err2 = input->getInput("dose stop region",d_stop);
00448             if (!err1 && !err2) {
00449                 if (d_start.size()==d_stop.size()) { // group of dose regions
00450                     for (int i=0; i<d_start.size(); i++) {
00451                         int ir = d_start[i], fr = d_stop[i];
00452                         for (int ireg=ir; ireg<=fr; ireg++) {
00453                             d_regions.push_back(ireg);
00454                         }
00455                     }
00456                     using_all_regions = false;
00457                 }
00458                 else egsWarning(
00459                         "%s: Mismatch in start and stop dose region groups !!!\n"
00460                         " Calculating dose in ALL regions.\n",func);
00461             }
00462         }
00463         EGS_Float norma = 1.0;
00464         int err04 = input->getInput("normalization",norma);
00465 
00466         //================================================
00467         // Check if one volume for each group requested.
00468         // If not just pass the volumes read and if there
00469         // is a mismatch, then the first volume element
00470         // or 1g/cm3 will be used.
00471         //=================================================
00472         vector <EGS_Float> volin;
00473         // groups of regions with same volume
00474         if (! using_all_regions && v_in.size()== d_start.size()) {
00475             for (int i=0; i<d_start.size(); i++) {
00476                 int ir = d_start[i], fr = d_stop[i];
00477                 for (int ireg=ir; ireg<=fr; ireg++) {
00478                     volin.push_back(v_in[i]);
00479                 }
00480             }
00481         }
00482         else { // all other possibilities handled here
00483             volin = v_in;
00484         }
00485         //=================================================
00486 
00487         /* Setup dose scoring object with input parameters */
00488         EGS_DoseScoring *result = new EGS_DoseScoring("",f);
00489         if (volin.size()==1) {
00490             result->setVol(volin[0]);    // one size for all regions
00491         }
00492         else if (volin.size()) {
00493             result->setVol(volin);    // regions with their volumes
00494         }
00495         else {
00496             result->setVol(1.0);    // default value if no entry
00497         }
00498         if (!using_all_regions) {
00499             result->setDoseRegions(d_regions);
00500         }
00501         if (d_in_medium) {
00502             result->setMediumScoring(true);
00503         }
00504         if (d_in_region) {
00505             result->setRegionScoring(true);
00506         }
00507         result->setName(input);
00508         if (!err04) {
00509             result->setUserNorm(norma);
00510         }
00511         return result;
00512     }
00513 
00514 }
